verses.verse: שׁ֚וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> return יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for כָשַׁ֖לְתָּ <S%H3782><s%> for thou hast fallen בַּעֲוֹנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5771><s%> by thine iniquity

קְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> Take עִמָּכֶם֙ <S%H5973><s%> with דְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> with you words וְשׁ֖וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> and turn אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD אִמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> away כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תִּשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> unto him Take away עָוֹן֙ <S%H5771><s%> all iniquity וְקַח־ <S%H3947><s%> and receive ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [us] graciously וּֽנְשַׁלְּמָ֥ה <S%H7999><s%> so will we render פָרִ֖ים <S%H6499><s%> the calves שְׂפָתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H8193><s%> of our lips

אַשּׁ֣וּר ׀ <S%H804><s%> Asshur לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יוֹשִׁיעֵ֗נוּ <S%H3467><s%> shall not save עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on סוּס֙ <S%H5483><s%> upon horses לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor נִרְכָּ֔ב <S%H7392><s%> us we will not ride וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor נֹ֥אמַר <S%H559><s%> neither will we say ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> [Ye are] our gods לְמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> any more to the work יָדֵ֑ינוּ <S%H3027><s%> of our hands אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בְּךָ֖ יְרֻחַ֥ם <S%H7355><s%> findeth mercy יָתֽוֹם׃ <S%H3490><s%> for in thee the fatherless

אֶרְפָּא֙ <S%H7495><s%> I will heal מְשׁ֣וּבָתָ֔ם <S%H4878><s%> their backsliding אֹהֲבֵ֖ם <S%H157><s%> I will love נְדָבָ֑ה <S%H5071><s%> them freely כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> is turned away אַפִּ֖י <S%H639><s%> for mine anger מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

אֶהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> will be like כַטַּל֙ <S%H2919><s%> I will be as the dew לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> unto Israel יִפְרַ֖ח <S%H6524><s%> he shall grow כַּשּֽׁוֹשַׁנָּ֑ה <S%H7799><s%> as the lily וְיַ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and cast forth שָׁרָשָׁ֖יו <S%H8328><s%> his roots כַּלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H3844><s%> as Lebanon

יֵֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> will sprout יֹֽנְקוֹתָ֔יו <S%H3127><s%> His branches וִיהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> will be like כַזַּ֖יִת <S%H2132><s%> shall be as the olive tree הוֹד֑וֹ <S%H1935><s%> and his beauty וְרֵ֥יחַֽ <S%H7381><s%> and his smell ל֖וֹ כַּלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H3844><s%> as Lebanon

יָשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> shall return יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> They that dwell בְצִלּ֔וֹ <S%H6738><s%> under his shadow יְחַיּ֥וּ <S%H2421><s%> they shall revive דָגָ֖ן <S%H1715><s%> [as] the corn וְיִפְרְח֣וּ <S%H6524><s%> and grow כַגָּ֑פֶן <S%H1612><s%> as the vine זִכְר֖וֹ <S%H2143><s%> the scent כְּיֵ֥ין <S%H3196><s%> thereof [shall be] as the wine לְבָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon ס

אֶפְרַ֕יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what לִּ֥י ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more לָֽעֲצַבִּ֑ים <S%H6091><s%> idol אֲנִ֧י <S%H589><s%> I עָנִ֣יתִי <S%H6030><s%> testify וַאֲשׁוּרֶ֗נּוּ <S%H7789><s%> [him] and observed אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I כִּבְר֣וֹשׁ <S%H1265><s%> fir tree רַֽעֲנָ֔ן <S%H7488><s%> him I [am] like a green מִמֶּ֖נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at פֶּרְיְךָ֥ <S%H6529><s%> From me is thy fruit נִמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> found

מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Whoever חָכָם֙ <S%H2450><s%> Who [is] wise וְיָ֣בֵֽן <S%H995><s%> and he shall understand אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these נָב֖וֹן <S%H995><s%> these [things]? prudent וְיֵֽדָעֵ֑ם <S%H3045><s%> and he shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יְשָׁרִ֞ים <S%H3477><s%> [are] right דַּרְכֵ֣י <S%H1870><s%> them? for the ways יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְצַדִּקִים֙ <S%H6662><s%> and the just יֵ֣לְכוּ <S%H1980><s%> will walk בָ֔ם וּפֹשְׁעִ֖ים <S%H6586><s%> in them but the transgressors יִכָּ֥שְׁלוּ <S%H3782><s%> shall fall בָֽם׃
